data.title: Things to do in New Orleans
meta_keywords: New Orleans Live Music Performance Free wine beer garden outdoors family friendly dog friendly bar cocktail playground party dance art culture bywater French quarter downtown uptown Mississippi River architecture
data.meta_description: A unique art-site comprised of musical architecture in New Orleans, LA. Created by New Orleans Airlift
data.text:
The Music Box Village is New Orleans Airlift's ongoing experiment in "musical architecture". With 16+ "musical houses" to date, the outdoor sonic sculpture garden is both an interactive art-site and a performance platform for one-of-a-kind concerts, artist residencies, and interdisciplinary works.

CLOSED AUG 18 - SEPT 6 for Summer vacation! See you Saturday, Sept 7 for opening day with workshops by Orlando Primo (Majek Fingers International Drumming School)

Check out the calendar for ticketing and further details.

Music Box Village is operated by New Orleans Airlift, a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization with the mission to forge connections between people, ideas, and cultures through collaborative artworks. Your financial support of our organization helps us to keep bringing folks together at Music Box with innovative performances, workshops, and hands on play!
